page.title: 18Events in the Butley Area
page.content: Butley is a small village with a very small population. There are few people to organise or enjoy special events. Each year there is a Flower Show which is very popular and attended by people from a wide area. Cups and prizes are awarded for the best entries in flower, vegetable, cooking, craft and art classes. There is a parish council which meets at least four times a year and a parochial church council that has regular meetings. Keep fit classes are held in the village hall. At Butley Middle School there is an open evening Badminton Club. Ayouth clubmeets once a week in a modern purpose-built building in the school grounds. The village hall is in poor condition and money is being raised for a replacement.
